item.title: Backing up all databases using mysqldump
item.description: In this post I’ll explain how I backup all databases in servers I work with. When you face trouble with those servers it’ll be pretty useful to have daily database dumps. So, I use mysqldump utiliy to backup database and an script I wrote myself to transfer files, which you can find here Backing up all databases with mysqldumpo is pretty easy, just use it in this way in bash: mysqldump -uadmin -p`cat /etc/psa/.

item.title: Transferring files with FTP through bash expect script
